Detailed Description

documentation for the DbImage class and the The data base configuration file. file, and more generally, the DataBase.

Function Documentation

void DbConfigDump ( ostream & stream = cout )
 

dumps to cout the (interpreted) contents of the configuration file.

It triggers DbInit if not already done.

void DbInit ( )
 

reads the config file. Called automatically if not user called.

If you programm does a lot of things before actually calling any DbImage constructor, it may be a good idea to call it early in your main to check if the configuration file is correct.
